attributes.action: SCRAP JAMIE OLIVERS SCHOOL FOOD POLICY!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AS MANY CHILDREN JUST LIKE MY OWN GO WITHOUT LUNCH BECAUSE THEY DON'T EAT THE STUFF THATS ON THE MENU!

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
